answer: FIR file karne ke liye login kare, Register Complaint page par jaakar incident details bhare. Police verification ke baad FIR register hoti hai.
FIR status check karne ke liye login kare aur Dashboard me 'My Complaints' section me jaye.

questions: FIR ke liye kya documents chahiye
answer: ID proof aur incident ki basic details chahiye jaise ki incident type, date, time, location, description etc. Evidence optional hota hai.

questions: Officer ki details kha pta kre
answer: Aap sabse pahle apna account login kre uske baad dashboard se complain ID copy kro aur fir usko my complaint me jaker track kro
Namaste! Main aapki AI Assistant hu. Aap mujhse FIR aur complaints ke baare mein pooch sakte hain.
